name: Play Rough RPG (Chapter 1 Demo)
description:
“PLAY ROUGH” is a turn-based post-apocalyptic JRPG.  Take control of Beau, a young person desperate to find a new life far to the west.  Befriend other travelers as you delve further and further into violence, overcoming ever-greater odds in order to reach a happy ending. In a world with living cartoons, mutated abominations made of meat and ink, and a collapsing power structure, anything is possible.
(WARNING: contains flashing lights, swearing, gore, and references to alcohol and tobacco.)
